channel.title: Ninja Escape - 317 [PI]
channel.description:
[center][size=18pt][b]Ninja Escape[/b][/size][/center]
<---------------------------------------------------------------------> Well I would like to first say that I had fun coding this server. I got into coding RsPs's to learn how to code java. I needed this as a base of education before I went into school for computer graphic design, and website design. This server has thought me a number of things about java, and I want you guys to have fun with it so you can also further your education. <---------------------------------------------------------------------> [center] [u][b]Home[/b][/u]
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/10sd3yw.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/t8nex4.png[/img]
[u][b]Skill Training[/b][/u]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/or4j0w.png[/img]
[u][b]Chill[/b][/u]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/ev4z2q.png[/img]
[u][b]Staffzone[/b][/u]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/300xh8p.png[/img]
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ I would like to say that my donator rank was earned by post count. That is why the 2 zones connect to one-another by tele.
[u][b]Donatorzone[/b][/u]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/j5x9pv.png[/img]
[u][b]SuperDonatorzone[/b][/u]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2ro3rdy.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/308i2qg.png[/img]
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ [u][b]Shops[/b][/u]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/zskcw6.png[/img][/center]
There is alot more things about the server. I'm just quitting rsps because I am focusing more on real-life then pixxles.
[ul][li]All skills work[/li] [li]Funpk[/li] [li]Dice[/li] [li]summoning[/li] [li]training emotes fixed[/li][/ul]
Talk *ALL* the shit you want. I find it funny as hell actually. It makes me laugh. :]
Credits: Trisidia - 10% That was his source that i fixed most of his fed up glitches. Vovik - 30% I didn't tell him i was giving him creds but oh-well. :P Ninja111... If you're smart you can add the rest.
Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/wbxytkxa2xl7z8j/Ninja%20Escape.rar

item.title: Ninja Escape - 317 [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Ninja111 Ninja111
item.description:
@Ninja111 wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:9, topic:532692”][quote author=Ninja111 link=topic=651481.msg4368905#msg4368905 date=1380216308]
Ohh, no man i re-coded the fudgeed up base. “horrible glitches”
[/quote]

says they recoded base
But still, I guess its better than about, lets say, ALOT of what people nowadays do and its glad to see someone try to put their own effort into the work. :)[/quote]

Haha, i did. If you download this, duping glitches are gone. Training emote glitches are fixed, And on “my” part
like i said i had this apart of my forum.

Read full topic

item.title: Ninja Escape - 317 [PI]
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Ninja111:

Added new emotes

doesnt see any recoding base

Ninja111:

updated Cache

doesnt involve recoding base

Ninja111:

one custom item “only one because eco fudges up if you add to many”

doesnt even involve touching base

Ninja111:

coded the server to work with my forums…

involves simple MySQL

Ninja111:

Ohh, no man i re-coded the fudgeed up base. “horrible glitches”

says they recoded base

Ninja111:

i had this thing for about a year to two. I can’t remember all the things i did.

trisidia v3 released December 14, 2012

But still, I guess its better than about, lets say, ALOT of what people nowadays do and its glad to see someone try to put their own effort into the work.

Read full topic

item.title: Ninja Escape - 317 [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Ninja111 Ninja111
item.description:
@Ninja111 wrote:

Ohh, no man i re-coded the fucked up base. “horrible glitches”
Added new emotes, updated Cache, one custom item “only one because eco fucks up if you add to many”, coded the server to work with my forums…
uhmmm, i had this thing for about a year to two. I can’t remember all the things i did.

Read full topic

item.title: Ninja Escape - 317 [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Ninja111, post:6, topic:532692”]I understand what your saying. It would have been the same though if I would have plainly
put “Chill location, This is where staffzone is, This is sdonarzone, or this is pkhangout…”
I just put it in a simple command perspective so the beginners already knew the command
so they don’t later post on this tread, “where are the commands”.[/quote]I don’t think you understood what I was getting at.

I am referring to the point that the pictures are pretty much implying all you did was make commands. Making commands is very basic java.

Read full topic

item.title: Ninja Escape - 317 [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Ninja111 Ninja111
item.description:
@Ninja111 wrote:

I understand what your saying. It would have been the same though if I would have plainly
put “Chill location, This is where staffzone is, This is sdonarzone, or this is pkhangout…”
I just put it in a simple command perspective so the beginners already knew the command
so they don’t later post on this tread, “where are the commands”.

Read full topic

not to be a hater but you make out like you “did rsps coding to learn java” but then you show commands… making commands is very very basic.
